title: My client will not install properly
body: I went to open my client today and it said that there was a problem patching, so I clicked restart (the only option) and the client restarted, and then it just did the same thing over and over again. To solve this, I tried uninstalling and reinstalling the client. Now when I open the launcher for the first time, an error message appears that says "Unspecified error occurred. Please check the logs for more information." I tried checking the logs for more information but I can't make heads or tails of it.

replies.body: Most of these infinite patcher loop errors should be cleared up at this point. If you're still having problems getting connected, do me a favor and try updating a few of your [**network settings**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues). If that still doesn't help, hit up our tech team in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) for a little more troubleshooting.
